```{r}
library(readxl)

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
sti_costs <- read_html("https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2426671/")

total_costs <- sti_costs %>% 
  html_nodes("table")

total_costs <- total_costs[[1]] %>% 
  html_table

total_costs
```
